original_title: Dead & Company: 2016.07.02 - Folsom Field, Boulder, CO
overview: Dead and Company performing at Folsom Field, Boulder, CO. SET I: Bertha, Good Lovin', Tennessee Jed, Cold Rain and Snow, Even So, Uncle John's Band, and One More Saturday Night  |  SET II:  Scarlet Begonias, Fire on the Mountain, Saint of Circumstance, Terrapin Station, Drums, Space, Stella Blue, Throwing Stones, and Not Fade Away  |  ENCORE:  Black Muddy River
title: Dead & Company: 2016.07.02 - Folsom Field, Boulder, CO
